origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'BusinessModelAPI.fetch_models', 'description': 'This function fetches business models for companies within a specified industry and status.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to fetch business models from, e.g., services, technology.'}, {'name': 'status', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The status of the companies, e.g., emerging, established.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'models', 'description': 'A list of business models for the specified companies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 BusinessModelAPI.fetch_models, 它的参数输入如下: 'industry'是'services', 'status'是'emerging'.
